getTables: SELECT rdb$relation_name FROM rdb$relations WHERE rdb$view_blr IS NULL AND (rdb$system_flag IS NULL OR rdb$system_flag = 0)

queries.TOTAL_VENDIDO_DIA: select sum(pi.valor_total) as totvendas,sum(pi.valor_real) as totcustos,(sum(pi.valor_total) - sum(pi.valor_real)) as totalmargem from pedido_itens pi where pi.cancelado = 'N' and cast(pi.data_lancamento as date) between ? and ?
queries.TICKET_MEDIO_DIA: select (sum(p.valor_total)/count(p.id)) as tktmedio from pedido p where p.cancelado = 'N' and cast(p.data_pedido as date) between ? and ?
queries.PRODUTOS_POR_ATENDIMENTO_DIA: select (sum(pi.quantidade)/(select count(p.id) from pedido p where p.cancelado = 'N' and cast(p.data_pedido as date) between ? and ?)) as mediaitem from pedido_itens pi where pi.cancelado = 'N' and cast(pi.data_lancamento as date) between ? and ?
queries.TOTAL_CUPONS_VALIDOS_DIA: select count(p.id) from pedido p where p.cancelado = 'N' and cast(p.data_pedido as date) between ? and ?
queries.TOTAL_CUPONS_CANCELADOS_DIA: select count(p.id) from pedido p where p.cancelado = 'S' and cast(p.data_pedido as date) between ? and ?
queries.VENDAS_POR_FAIXA_HORARIA: select extract(hour from pi.data_lancamento) as hora, sum(pi.valor_total) as TOTVENDAS, count(pi.id) as TOTCUPOM, sum(pi.quantidade) as TOTITEMVENDIDO, (sum(pi.valor_total)/count(pi.id)) as VLMEDIOVENDA, (sum(pi.quantidade)/count(pi.id)) as QTDMEDIOVENDA from pedido_itens pi where (extract(minute from pi.data_lancamento) between 0 and 59) and (extract(hour from pi.data_lancamento) = extract(hour from pi.data_lancamento)) and (cast(pi.data_lancamento as date) between ? and ?) and pi.cancelado = 'N' group by hora
queries.PRODUTOS_MAIS_VENDIDOS_DIA: select first 200 pi.ean13, pi.descricao, sum(pi.valor) as VLUNIT, sum(pi.quantidade) as QTD, sum(pi.valor_total) as VLTOTAL from pedido_itens pi where cast(pi.data_lancamento as date) between ? and ? and pi.cancelado = 'N' group by pi.ean13, pi.descricao order by VLTOTAL desc
queries.PRODUTOS_ESTATISTICA: select first 5000 pi.ean13, pi.descricao, sum(pi.valor) as VLUNIT, sum(pi.quantidade) as QTD, sum(pi.valor_total) as VLTOTAL from pedido_itens pi where cast(pi.data_lancamento as date) between ? and ? and pi.cancelado = 'N' group by pi.ean13, pi.descricao order by VLTOTAL desc
queries.TOTAL_VENDIDO_POR_MODALIDADES: select fp.tipo_documento, fp.descricao, count(fp.id) as qtd, sum(fp.valor-fp.troco) as totvenda from pedido_formapag fp where cast(fp.datalancamento as date) = ? group by fp.tipo_documento, fp.descricao order by totvenda desc
queries.ESTORNO_DE_CUPONS_POR_OPERADOR_DIA: SELECT c.pdvnum, (lpad(EXTRACT(DAY FROM c.datalancamento), 2, '0') || '/' || lpad(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM datalancamento), 2, '0') || '/' || lpad(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM datalancamento), 4, '0')) AS DATA, (lpad(EXTRACT(HOUR FROM datalancamento), 2, '0') || ':' || lpad(EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM datalancamento), 2, '0')) AS hora, c.nomefuncionario, c.nomesupervisor, c.valorpedido, c.idpedido FROM cancelamentos c WHERE CAST (c.datalancamento AS date) BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY c.datalancamento
queries.DESCONTOS_DE_ITENS_DIA: select (cast (pi.data_lancamento as date)) as data, (cast (pi.data_lancamento as time)) as hora, pi.vendedor, pi.desconto, pi.idpedido, pi.num_item, pi.ean13, pi.descricao from pedido_itens pi where pi.desconto > 0 and cast(pi.data_lancamento as date) between ? and ? and pi.cancelado = 'N' order by hora
queries.VENDAS_POR_SECOES_DIA: select pi.idgrupo, pi.grupo, sum(pi.quantidade) as qtd, sum(pi.valor_total) as total, sum(pi.valor_real) as totcusto, sum(pi.valor_total-pi.valor_real) as totlucro from pedido_itens pi where pi.cancelado = 'N' and cast(pi.data_lancamento as date) = ? group by pi.idgrupo, pi.grupo order by total desc
queries.TOTAL_CUPONS_POR_OPERADOR_DIA: select count(p.id) as qtdcupons, p.vendedor, sum(p.valor_total) as valor from pedido p where p.cancelado = 'N' and cast(p.data_pedido as date) between ? and ? group by p.vendedor order by qtdcupons desc
queries.VENDAS_POR_VENDEDOR_DIA: select cast(p.data_pedido as date) as data, p.vendedor, sum(p.valor_total) as total, count(p.id) as cupons, sum(p.totalitens) as itens, (sum(p.totalitens)/count(p.id)) as mediaitens, (sum(p.valor_total)/count(p.id)) as mediavalor from pedido p where cast (p.data_pedido as date) between ? and ? and p.cancelado = 'N' group by data, p.vendedor
queries.MODALIDADES_PAGAMENTO_OPERADOR_DIA: select cast(pf.datalancamento as date) as data, pf.vendedor, pf.tipo_documento, pf.descricao, count(pf.id) as qtd, sum(pf.valor-pf.troco) as valor from pedido_formapag pf where cast(pf.datalancamento as date) between ? and ? group by cast(pf.datalancamento as date), pf.vendedor, pf.tipo_documento, pf.descricao
